body: From my understanding this is part of a serie Ch 1 https://nhentai.net/g/62508/ ch 2 https://nhentai.net/g/53043/ and then lastly this one that is ch 3. Pretty much ch 1 has the blonde girl being together with her husband but then ex-bf appears and cause he was so great at sex she starts sleeping  with him and decides to be with him cause of the better sex rings and dumps the husband. But then after she's pregnant the ex-bf dumps her and she crawls back to the hubby who accepts her. Ch 2 is sometime after ch 1 and blonde girl helps another friend get a job at a playboys cafe who instantly seduces her and makes her his bitch. Pretty much all the women at the cafe are his sex slaves. Then ch 3 has the ex-bf come back and start impregnating the blonde girl again, but this time she doesn't dump the hubby cause he's the perfect "caretaker" for their kids so better to keep him around...
feels bad for the hubby. nice story, was very educational.
